dublin_core.dcvalue: Tobacco smoking prevalence continues to be high particularly among adolescents and young adults with lower educational levels and is therefore a serious public health problem Tobacco smoking and problem drinking often co occur and relapses after successful smoking cessation are often associated with alcohol use This study aims at testing the efficacy of an integrated smoking cessation and alcohol intervention by comparing it to a smoking cessation only intervention for young people delivered via the Internet and mobile phone
Efficacy of an Internet and SMS-based integrated smoking cessation and alcohol intervention for smoking cessation in young people: study protocol of a two-arm cluster randomised controlled trial.
